verses.roman:
api sarve kuśalinas
tava putrā manasvini
lakṣaye ’svastham ātmānaṁ
bhavatyā lakṣaṇair aham

synonyms: api—whether; sarve—all; kuśalinaḥ—in full auspiciousness; tava—your; putrāḥ—sons; manasvini—O great-minded lady; lakṣaye—I see; asvastham—not in tranquillity; ātmānam—the mind; bhavatyāḥ—of you; lakṣaṇaiḥ—by symptoms; aham—I.
translation: O great-minded lady, are all your sons faring well? Seeing your withered face, I can perceive that your mind is not tranquil. How is this so?
